# Making Money This guide will explain many of the ways to make money in The Threshold.
## Get a Job You can get a job with a ship crew or at a space station and recieve a wage every twenty minutes. Finding a job in The Threshold is very easy and you have probably arrived very close to a hiring desk.
## Complete Cargo Bounties and Export Valuables In the Threshold cargo bounties are usually free for any individual or organization to complete. Find a cargo bounty terminal to start printing manifests.
If you can reach a trade station you can sell goods and complete bounties for cash and if you belong to a faction you can directly deposit the funds into the faction account.
## Provide Goods and Services to other people.
An invoice printer can be used to create digital invoices that other people can use to easily pay you money in exchange for a service or good. You can get filthy rich by selling valuable goods and services to your fellow Threshold residents.
## Start a Faction and Sieze a Trade Station
Factions can be created in the Threshold which allow you to organize assignments, accesses and wages and assign them to faction members. When a faction reaches level three it grows mighty enough to sieze a trade station.
The faction in control of a trade station can set taxes on imports and exports from that trade station. As consecutive bounties are completed your trade station will level up. A level 1 trade station charges the faction $5000 every time bounties respawn. A level 3 trade station pays a $10000 reward every time bounties respawn. Controlling a trade station is the best way to gain power and wealth in the Threshold.
